plays.text: Goal scored by Kip Miller assisted by Mats Lindgren and Dave Scatchard
Penalty to Eric Cairns 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Allison

Penalty to Alexei Yashin 2 minutes for Hooking Steve Heinze
Goal scored by Adam Mair assisted by Jaroslav Modry and Kelly Buchberger
Penalty to Oleg Kvasha 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Allison
Penalty to Adrian Aucoin 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Slashing Brad Chartrand
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Adam Deadmarsh and Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Nelson Emerson 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jason Allison 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Slashing Dick Tarnstrom
